content: Display notification when moving items to Trash

comment.text: This translation key describes the notification to be displayed when moving items to Trash. It is used as a placeholder text in a UI component that triggers the action.

usage.context: {t("DisplayNotification")}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Zibil qutusuna atılan zaman bildirişi göstər' is a literal translation but sounds slightly unnatural in Azerbaijani. A more natural phrasing would be closer to 'Zibilə atılan fayllar üçün bildiriş göstər' or 'Zibilə atılan elementlər üçün bildiriş göstər'. The current translation emphasizes the action of *throwing* into the trash, while the English implies the system should notify when items are *moved* to the trash.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zibilə atılan fayllar üçün bildiriş göstər

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Ցուցադրել ծանուցումները աղբարկղ տեղափոխելիս" is a literal translation but doesn't quite capture the intended meaning of 'Display notification when moving items to Trash'. A more natural and accurate translation would focus on informing the user about the item's destination.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Հաղորդելու ծանուցում, երբ իրեր տեղափոխվում են աղբարկղ:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Mostrar notificação ao mover itens para a Lixo" is not the most natural or accurate rendering of 'Display notification when moving items to Trash'. "Lixo" is the literal translation of trash, but a more idiomatic expression would be 'a Pasta de Lixo' or 'para a área de Lixo'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Mostrar notificação ao mover itens para a Pasta de Lixo

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Показывать предупреждение при перемещении элемента в корзину' is too literal. 'Display notification' implies a visual notification, while 'предупреждение' translates more closely to 'warning'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Показывать уведомление при перемещении элемента в корзину

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'අථක කුණුකූඩයට ගෙනයන විට දැනුම්දීමක් පෙන්වන්න' is a literal translation but could be improved for naturalness. 'අථක' might not be the most common or clear word for 'Trash'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තැකැළි බඳුනට ගෙනයන විට දැනුම්දීමක් පෙන්වන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'අථක' might be acceptable, 'තැකැළි' or a more common term for 'Trash' would be preferable to avoid potential confusion.

The translation uses 'Прикажи' which translates to 'Show' or 'Display'. While technically correct, a more natural and common phrasing for this context in Serbian (Cyrillic) would be 'Покажи' (Pokazi) which also means 'Show'. 'Прикажи' is more formal and less frequently used in user interface contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Покажи нотификацију када померате ставке у Отпад

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Отпад' is generally understood as 'Trash', but 'Коша за смеће' (Kosha za smeće) which directly translates to 'Trash Bin' is more common and clearer in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Покажи нотификацију када померате ставке у Коша за смеће

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Prikaži notifikaciju kada pomerate stavke u Otpad' is technically correct but sounds a bit formal and direct. A more natural phrasing would be more common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Prikaži obaveštenje kada premeštate datoteke u Koš za smeće

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "将项目移至回收站时展示消息通知" is a bit too literal. A more natural and concise translation would be better. The phrase '展示消息通知' is a bit formal and clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 将项目移至回收站时显示通知
